name: VShojo Halloween Fangame 2021
description:
This is a fangame made for the 2021 VShojo Halloween Art contest. 
The creation of this fanwork is not associated with VShojo nor its members, and is purely made for entertainment purposes.

I treated this project like a game jam due to the limited time I had to make this, so please do not expect a continuation of the game.
I hope you enjoy this. Thank you for playing, and please keep supporting small content creators.
